mapper.insert: insert into sys_user_token (user_id, token_name, token_value, expiration_time, create_time, is_del, status, api_times, create_id) values (#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tokenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tokenValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expirationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDel,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{status,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{apiTimes,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update sys_user_token
user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
token_name = #{token_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
token_value = #{token_value,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
expiration_time = #{expiration_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

`status` = #{status,jdbcType=BOOLEAN},
api_times = #{api_times,jdbcType=BIGINT},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sys_user_token set user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, token_name = #{token_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, token_value = #{token_value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expiration_time = #{expiration_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_del = #{is_del,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, api_times = #{api_times,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_id = #{create_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
UPDATE sys_user_token set api_times=api_times-1 WHERE id = #{id}
